TopicTitle: Okay the single most consistently irritating thing in this game has probably always been "Control From Here" prioritization.

Articles.Content: I just screwed up ANOTHER burn because the goddamn game decides I want to steer my rocket from the perspective of the backwards-facing docking node on the station part I'm towing into location. AAAAAAARGH.

This is how sky net starts. The AI leans by messing up an innocent video game and ultimately... killer robots crushing skulls under their feet. 

I feel your pain. I have been its victim as well.
